mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where status = 'Y'
select count(*) from qna where status = 'Y'
select NOTICE_NO , USER_ID , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , to_char(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "NOTICE_DATE" from notice n join member using(user_no) where n.STATUS = 'Y' order by NOTICE_NO desc
select QNA_NO , USER_ID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_ANSWER , to_char(QNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "QNA_DATE" from qna q join member using(user_no) where q.STATUS = 'Y'

select NOTICE_NO , USER_ID , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , to_char(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "NOTICE_DATE" from notice n join member using(user_no) where n.STATUS = 'Y' and NOTICE_NO = #{boardNo} order by NOTICE_NO desc
select QNA_NO , USER_ID , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_ANSWER , QNA_DATE from qna q join member using(user_no) where q.STATUS = 'Y' and qna_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into notice ( NOTICE_NO , USER_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( seq_nbo.nextval , 1 , #{noticeTitle} , #{noticeContent} )
insert into qna ( QNA_NO , USER_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT ) VALUES ( seq_qbo.nextval , 1 , #{qnaTitle} , #{qnaContent} )
